text: Kitchen Sink was American cooking-themed television series that aired on Food Network. It was presented by a rotating lineup of chefs who taught the viewers how to create different indulgent recipes. During the first season, the series was titled The Kitchen Sink. The series is a spin-off of The Kitchen. However, unlike The Kitchen, it did not have a studio audience; and it ran for 22 minutes instead of 41 minutes. == Episodes == === Season 1 (2016) === {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="width:60%;" |- !style="background- color: #ab5b78;
